!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: dnp-therapy
blog.description: What would the world be like if we had a little bit more love?

summary: i've had a crush on my maths tutor for two months now and he's super nice and pretty and he smiles and laughs a lot and he...
question: i've had a crush on my maths tutor for two months now and he's super nice and pretty and he smiles and laughs a lot and he teases me :)))))))))) and i see him in school sometimes and then my heart just jumps around but he's leaving high school next year :((( how will i live

reblog.comment: Damn, that’s rough 😓

trail.content_raw: Damn, that’s rough 😓
trail.content: Damn, that’s rough 😓

blog.name: ohforphuckssake
blog.title: DAN&PHIL
blog.description: Dan&Phil photoshop  doodles  and musings   // music nerd // 34 // Queer // Scandinavian DK// Name's Louise but you can call me Lou // she/they

tags: reall.. if you read all that... i hope it made sense...
otherwise sorry fro wasting your time
summary: So, this is just some thoughts I’ve had on the whole “People are leaving the Phandom” and “dnp’s youtube views are declining”...
body:
So, this is just some thoughts I’ve had on the whole “People are leaving the Phandom” and “dnp’s youtube views are declining” issue. 

I feel like people who was in it for the “phan mystery” is slowly turning away from the phandom. As dnp are getting more and more open and comfortable, there is less to speculate about, there’s hardly any “OMG did u see that little look, that small almost touch!?” moments anymore. Their relationship? It’s there, it’s real, and we can all (well almost all) see it for what it is. 

I think that the ones who’ve been very much into speculating about their relationship, trying to find phan proof, going crazy over a lingering look are disappearing, and for good reason. But if that was all they cared about, then that’s not really a loss for dnp imo. Because that isn’t really a healthy relationship to have with an audience. 

And really, I think they are better off with a smaller audience that really cares about them as real people, than a large one that treats them like fictional characters. 

Of course there are others things at play with them loosing subs and views, like fewer uploads and inconsistency during tour, and youtube having changed just in general.

But much like the Vlogbrothers, I don’t think they are interested in actively growing their following anymore, not trying to stay “relevant”. And in the end, people will always find their tribe, meaning new people will come while others go without dnp having to do much.

I think they are trying to figure out what their next career move is going to be, and I think especially Dan is just fine with having YouTube being a casual thing.

They aren’t really teen idols anymore, they are smart grown men with a lot of potential and connections, they’ll be just fine with whatever they chose to do.  And I’d rather see them with more projects outside of YouTube then see them try desperately to hang on to that YouTuber thing only (like some of their peers that aren’t really managing it that well *cough*anthony*cough*)

But anyway, this was way too long, sorry, and probably nothing new, but these are just my thoughts on it. ty ly bb

trail.content:
So, this is just some thoughts I’ve had on the whole “People are leaving the Phandom” and “dnp’s youtube views are declining” issue. 

I feel like people who was in it for the “phan mystery” is slowly turning away from the phandom. As dnp are getting more and more open and comfortable, there is less to speculate about, there’s hardly any “OMG did u see that little look, that small almost touch!?” moments anymore. Their relationship? It’s there, it’s real, and we can all (well almost all) see it for what it is. 

I think that the ones who’ve been very much into speculating about their relationship, trying to find phan proof, going crazy over a lingering look are disappearing, and for good reason. But if that was all they cared about, then that’s not really a loss for dnp imo. Because that isn’t really a healthy relationship to have with an audience. 

And really, I think they are better off with a smaller audience that really cares about them as real people, than a large one that treats them like fictional characters. 

Of course there are others things at play with them loosing subs and views, like fewer uploads and inconsistency during tour, and youtube having changed just in general.

But much like the Vlogbrothers, I don’t think they are interested in actively growing their following anymore, not trying to stay “relevant”. And in the end, people will always find their tribe, meaning new people will come while others go without dnp having to do much.

I think they are trying to figure out what their next career move is going to be, and I think especially Dan is just fine with having YouTube being a casual thing.

They aren’t really teen idols anymore, they are smart grown men with a lot of potential and connections, they’ll be just fine with whatever they chose to do.  And I’d rather see them with more projects outside of YouTube then see them try desperately to hang on to that YouTuber thing only (like some of their peers that aren’t really managing it that well *cough*anthony*cough*)

But anyway, this was way too long, sorry, and probably nothing new, but these are just my thoughts on it. ty ly bb

summary: 1) but wouldn't the "I think dan and phil are a couple based on x, y and z thing they posted (and then probably deleted) in the...
question: 1) but wouldn't the "I think dan and phil are a couple based on x, y and z thing they posted (and then probably deleted) in the past" be an invasive theory as well? because it's about their personal lives and it has to do with some private stuff that they themselves never talk about?
answer:
“2) I mean, if someone assumes they’re a couple because they live together and because of how close they are, there are still many examples of them, their family members, their friends, etc denying the whole phan thing. digging further is invasive in and of itself. despite it seeming logical, it’s still not something dnp willingly choose to discuss with us. so basically you’re okay with the invasive theories as long as they don’t sound stupid to you?”


.

.

.


Okay, I guess I walked into this one. I’m just not sure how to articulate the difference. I feel like there’s a line between “hey I think this” and “OH MY GOD THIS IS REAL LOOK OH GOD” that makes one of them slightly more okay than the other.


I guess maybe it’s just… the level of respect a person shows. You all know by now that my whole opinion on shipping and theorizing is basically, “do it if you want, just remember you might be wrong.”


So I feel like maybe that’s the difference. If you’re just saying “I think Dan and Phil might be a couple because this reason and that reason” but you’re being calm and reasonable about it, then that’s not really a bad thing. That’s just a person having an opinion.


But when you’re saying things like “Dan and Phil are in love and have been for ten years and if you don’t believe that you’re wrong” then that’s not just you having an opinion. That’s you having an opinion, and pushing it onto others.


In my mind, what makes a theory invasive is when you go searching for things that Dan and Phil do not, or have not, shared. For example: “Dan and Phil must be a couple because they shared a bed at an Airbnb in Australia, how do I know? I searched for the listing online, look, here it is!” That’s something you went looking for, that Dan and Phil never gave.


But if you’re looking at things Dan and Phil have actually gone and posted, like old tweets, etc, then that’s a little different. Because Dan and Phil themselves put that out there at one point or another.


I don’t know if this makes any sense, or clarifies anything. It’s just a bit difficult to explain, you know?

summary: i know this may come as a shock to some people but dan is most probably either 1) a furry or 2) v interested in furry...
body:
i know this may come as a shock to some people but dan is most probably either 1) a furry or 2) v interested in furry communities.

yes, he IS joking, but the interest didn’t come from nowhere and there is nothing wrong with it. so all the memes on “is he serious” could really just end now.

tags: i think im gonna get death threats and anon hate from people
summary: tbh i think there is some truth behind dan talking about furries and being one. i really believe it is a true interest of his. i...
body:
tbh i think there is some truth behind dan talking about furries and being one. i really believe it is a true interest of his. i think he’s expressing it in a way to be “funny” but that doesn’t mean he is just “lying” and/or “mocking” people. 

you can find what he says “objectionable” - but jesus christ don’t write it off as simply just a “joke”.
